name: IN THE STRATOSPHERE
description: IN THE STRATOSPHERE, is the second half of the mini diptych. A place that always made me feel like I was in the stratosphere was at a cinema. During this time period, theaters were still closed from COVID19 restrictions. This song just reminds me that no matter how bad life could be or gets, that we keep hope alive for better days. Either that or I'm just delusional to think things will get better. Who knows? I tend to be the eternal optimist. I know some of the works in this book probably say otherwise, but I truly try to see the positives and the opportunities that are in front of me or other people. We are all walking contradictions...all of us.
